EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-01-17-Cloud and Beyond.ES - 5.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Will AI become ubiquitous by 2020?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]> Take Survey & Enter to Win $500 Amazon Gift Card <[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
How will rising adoption in multicloud and AI impact you and businesses like yours in 2019 and beyond?
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]>
Answer this survey <[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]>and we'll compile the findings in our upcoming report, "The State of Multicloud and Beyond."
This survey will take approximately 8 minutes to complete and you'll be entered in a raffle for a $500 Amazon Gift Card. Furthermore, if you'd like to learn more about Turbonomic, we are offering a $50 Amazon Gift Card for completing a 30-minute meeting. Regards, Megan
